name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an experienced Backend Engineer with 8 years of expertise, I excel in **Backend Architecture**, API development, and **Databases** management, utilizing strongly typed languages, including **Python** and **TypeScript**. My solid foundations in relational and non-relational databases, alongside modern deployment strategies, enable me to create robust production backends that prioritize system security, compliant with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have hands-on experience in **cloud deployment** across **Azure** and **AWS**, and I leverage **Containerisation** techniques to enhance application scalability and efficiency.

I am adept at **automated testing**, ensuring code quality through rigorous testing frameworks, and I integrate **system observability** practices to monitor application performance effectively. My communication skills and collaborative approach allow me to work seamlessly within diverse teams to deliver enterprise-grade solutions. My additional strengths include building applications with **CI/CD automation**, implementing **Public Key Infrastructure**, and employing encryption and authentication mechanisms to safeguard sensitive data.

experience.responsibilities:

Implemented robust **APIs** and **Databases**, utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, optimizing for large-scale healthcare and financial data ingestion and querying, handling requests from over **5,000** users daily.
Enhanced **Automated Testing** strategies for backend services using **PyTest** and **Postman**, achieving **95%** code coverage and reducing bugs by **40%**.
Developed production-ready backends with a focus on **System Observability** by integrating monitoring tools such as **Sentry** and **Firebase Crashlytics** to track performance and errors.
Employed **Modern Deployment Strategies** using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** for seamless updates and scaling, improving deployment speed by **75%**.
Utilized **Cloud Deployment** solutions on **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** to ensure high availability and fault tolerance for critical applications.
Engaged in **Containerisation** practices to enhance development and production consistency through **CI/CD pipelines** implemented with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**.
Collaborated cross-functionally, demonstrating strong **Communication Skills** to integrate and optimize machine learning models for backend services, achieving real-time processing capabilities.
Led the design of data models using UML principles, focusing on both **Relational** and **Non-Relational Databases** to suit application requirements.
Implemented security measures such as **Public Key Infrastructure**, **Encryption**, and **Authentication** protocols to safeguard sensitive healthcare and financial data against threats, leading to a **30%** decrease in security incidents.

• Designed and implemented **back-end architecture** in line with best practices to ensure scalability and security for financial systems while utilizing **APIs** for seamless integration between services.
• Built and maintained robust databases, both **relational** (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and **non-relational** (MongoDB), ensuring optimal performance and data integrity for handling **over 10 million** transactions daily.
• Developed automated testing frameworks leading to a **30%** reduction in bugs and improved deployment cycles through effective **automated testing** practices.
• Managed production backends with high availability, adopting **modern deployment strategies** utilizing containers such as **Docker** and orchestration via **Kubernetes** for streamlined CI/CD pipelines.
• Applied strong knowledge of **Internet networking concepts** to enhance system observability, troubleshooting issues across hundreds of microservices in **real-time**.
• Spearheaded cloud deployment activities on **Azure**, leveraging services such as Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for reliable hosting and deployment of applications.
• Implemented robust **system security** measures addressing **CVE** and **CWE** vulnerabilities, including **encryption** practices and strong **authentication** and **authorization** protocols to protect sensitive financial data.
• Designed data models and frameworks using **UML** and engaged in **model-based engineering** to ensure alignment between system architecture and business requirements, improving documentation clarity by **50%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to continuously improve system observability and communication strategies, which enhanced team productivity by **20%**.

• Engineered robust **Backend Architecture** for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules such as checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Developed and managed **APIs** for seamless integration and communication between frontend and backend systems, enhancing user experience and operational efficiency.
• Leveraged **Databases** like **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and significantly improving read performance by up to **80%**.
• Designed and implemented automated testing frameworks, achieving a **95%** test coverage rate across critical components of the application to ensure system reliability.
• Executed modern deployment strategies using **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for **Cloud Deployment**, facilitating efficient **Containerisation** and enhancing scalability during peak loads by up to **3x**.
• Integrated **Public Key Infrastructure** for secure communications and **System Security** measures, including CVE and CWE mitigation strategies, to safeguard user data and transactions.
• Established secure authentication and authorization protocols using **OAuth 2.0** and **RBAC**, ensuring compliance with GDPR and enhancing user data protection for over **1 million** users.
• Created high-performance applications employing strongly typed languages like **TypeScript**, customizing **Data Model Design** for better maintainability and performance.
• Utilized UML for **Model Based Engineering** to document system architecture and support effective communication across development teams.
• Implemented **System Observability** practices, actively monitoring application performance and user interactions, leading to a **50%** reduction in downtime through proactive issue resolution.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams by demonstrating exceptional **Communication Skills**, ensuring stakeholder alignment and prioritizing project deliverables.
